channel.title: How to Add a Guy that Sells Money for PKP
channel.description: Ok so i want to add an NPC that when you click on him, you can buy 1M cash for 1 PKP. i need this because i want to put mroe money into my server's economy. if anyone could help me i would appreciate it! also i have teamviewer if you want to do it for me :) thanks! - fluffy

item.title: How to Add a Guy that Sells Money for PKP
item.dc:creator: @Fluffys Fluffys
item.description:
@Fluffys wrote:

ok i made dialouge. and also i made the thing that gives you the 1M for the 1PKP called “1M for 1PKP” when you click on it it gives you 1M but takes away 1.5m i know where to change this. it says

} else if(c.dialogueAction == 28) {
c.getItems().addItem(995,1000000);
c.getItems().deleteItem(995, c.getItems().getItemSlot(995), 1500000);
and i need the .deleteitem to delete 1 pkp. know how to do this?

Read full topic
item.source: How to Add a Guy that Sells Money for PKP

item.title: How to Add a Guy that Sells Money for PKP
item.dc:creator: @cmcmvj cmcmvj
item.description:
@cmcmvj wrote:

it’s easy mate make a dialogue.
example:

1
Hello Adventurer! I exchange your pkp for money!
Click here to continue(1pkp = 1M) --> goes to 2
2
buy 1m with 1pkp --> goes to 3
no way that to much! --> exits
3
remove 1 pkp
additem 995 1000000(–> 4 if not enough money) --> 5 if enough money
4
Sorry i don’t have enough money
5
Thank you!

Try it first yourself

If you have any problems post them here.

Read full topic
item.source: How to Add a Guy that Sells Money for PKP
